\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

   \small
   % https://q.uiver.app/#
   \begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
   A \& B \& C \\
   {A'} \& {B'} \& C
   \arrow["i", tail, from=1-1, to=1-2]
   \arrow["f"', from=1-1, to=2-1]
   \arrow["p", two heads, from=1-2, to=1-3]
   \arrow["{f'}", from=1-2, to=2-2]
   \arrow[equals, from=1-3, to=2-3]
   \arrow["{i'}"', tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
   \arrow["{p'}"', two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
   \end{tikzcd}
   \end{document}
